title: StawGAN: Structural-Aware Generative Adversarial Networks for Infrared Image Translation. (arXiv:2305.10882v1 [cs.CV])
abstract: This paper addresses the problem of translating night-time thermal infrared images, which are the most adopted image modalities to analyze night-time scenes, to daytime color images (NTIT2DC), which provide better perceptions of objects. We introduce a novel model that focuses on enhancing the quality of the target generation without merely colorizing it. The proposed structural aware (StawGAN) enables the translation of better-shaped and high-definition objects in the target domain. We test our model on aerial images of the DroneVeichle dataset containing RGB-IR paired images. The proposed approach produces a more accurate translation with respect to other state-of-the-art image translation models. The source code is available at https://github.com/LuigiSigillo/StawGAN

Title: StawGAN: Structural-Aware Generative Adversarial Networks for Infrared Image Translation. (arXiv:2305.10882v1 [cs.CV])
Abstract: This paper addresses the problem of translating night-time thermal infrared images, which are the most adopted image modalities to analyze night-time scenes, to daytime color images (NTIT2DC), which provide better perceptions of objects. We introduce a novel model that focuses on enhancing the quality of the target generation without merely colorizing it. The proposed structural aware (StawGAN) enables the translation of better-shaped and high-definition objects in the target domain. We test our model on aerial images of the DroneVeichle dataset containing RGB-IR paired images. The proposed approach produces a more accurate translation with respect to other state-of-the-art image translation models. The source code is available at https://github.com/LuigiSigillo/StawGAN
translated_title: StawGAN: 面向红外图像翻译的结构感知生成对抗网络
translated_abstract: 本文解决了将夜间热红外图像（NTIT2DC）翻译成白天彩色图像的问题。我们引入了一种新型的模型，专注于提高目标生成的质量，而不仅仅是对其上色。所提出的结构感知（StawGAN）在目标域中实现了更好的形状和高清晰度对象的翻译。我们在DroneVeichle 数据集的航拍图像上对模型进行了测试，结果显示与其他最先进的图像翻译模型相比，所提出的方法产生了更准确的翻译。源代码可在https://github.com/LuigiSigillo/StawGAN找到。
tldr: 本文提出了一种名为StawGAN的结构感知生成对抗网络，可以将热红外图像翻译成白天彩色图像，并在目标域中提供更好的形状和高清晰度对象的翻译，达到了比其他最先进的图像翻译模型更准确的结果。
en_tdlr: This paper presents a novel Structural-Aware Generative Adversarial Network (StawGAN) for translating night-time thermal infrared images into daytime color images, resulting in better-shaped and high-definition objects in the target domain. The proposed approach achieves more accurate translation compared to other state-of-the-art image translation models on the DroneVeichle dataset.
